name: YouPickIt
description:
Fight your way through the house. Collecting coins and killing book-plants! How fast can you go? Can you get all the coins?

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Shift to roll
  • Q to switch to weapons
  • Sword and Shield Controls
    • LMB to swing sword
    • RMB to block with shield
  • Bow Controls
    • Press and/or hold LMB to pull back on your bow
    • Let go of LMB to fire your bow

Used Marketplace Assets

  • Modular RPG Heroes Polyart- https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/modular-rpg-heroes-polyart
  • Platformer Starter Pack - https://unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/Platfunner
  • HQ Residential House - https://unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/NOTLonely
  • Houseplant Pack - Interior and Exterior Plants - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/IanRoach
